description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=2/3, Mature Content=2/3. Karnn Age Lite is the 200 msPoints version of Karnn Age. It's a twin stick shooter featuring original and innovative ennemy patterns and bosses. Karnn Age Lite features everything in Karnn Age, except it has 3 songs instead of 9, to reach required file size for 200 points game.
description.short: Karnn Age Lite is the 200 msPoints version of Karnn Age. It's a twin stick shooter featuring original and innovative ennemy patterns and bosses. Karnn Age Lite features everything in Karnn Age, except it has 3 songs instead of 9, to reach required file size for 200 points game.
